entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:06 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -5.5°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -10.0°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
